raw.title: Albertans could press for referendums on policy ideas, constitutional change under proposed legislation
raw.snippet: Alberta introduced legislation Tuesday that would allow citizens to push the government to trigger a referendum on policy or constitutional change.

raw.title: Strong Alberta supports Confederation and drives national economy, UCP says
